subject: Little League World Series
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Joshua Houston’s tiebreaking single in the fifth inning lifted Chicago’s Jackie Robinson West to an 8-7 victory over Cumberland, R.I., in the Little League World Series on Monday.
snippet: Joshua Houston’s tiebreaking single in the fifth inning lifted Chicago’s Jackie Robinson West to an 8-7 victory over Cumberland, R.I., in the Little League World Series on Monday.
